name: Eye of Sicily
description:
https://forms.gle/oJCxtGZrR3RYpjtH6

<>

Very rough first build with  few bugs.

Press "E" to pick up items

Press "Tab" while holding an Eye to equip it.

Press "Space" once equipped to blink/use the Eye (You can't pick up items in this mode for some reason)

The game ends when you have opened the 2nd door.
